snippet.title: Life's Too Short GB: A Christmas Spirit - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
In Life's Too Short GB: A Christmas Spirit, you once again take on the role of a celestial problem-solver called back to the vampire's mansion. This time it's the count and countess themselves making the call...A rash decision has been made and it's your job to save Christmas!

You'll need to explore the mansion, meet various spooky characters and solve simple puzzles in order to ensure baby Vlad's first Christmas isn't ruined.

Life's Too Short: A Christmas Spirit was originally released on the Playdate in 2022. The game is a spin-off semi-sequel to Life's Too Short and whilst it's set in the same house and some familiar characters, it's a whole new story with new characters and puzzles (And this time, in colour!)

You can get the original Life's Too Short GB here: https://pixel-ghost.itch.io/lifes-too-short-gb 

In the final game you will:

Help a clumsy yeti
Meet a rather unhinged Santa
Witness a riddle rap battle between The Grouch and a skeleton
Solves lots of cool puzzles
And do your very best to save Christmas!
Here's what some kind folks had to say about the original:

- "Perfect little sequel." - PizzaFuel

- "adorably christmas :)" - Ledbetter

- "Fun, funny, and heartwarming!" - Ron Lent​​​

Controls

Select = Inventory

A = Confirm

B = Cancel or go back

Start = Save

Credits

- Developed by Ollie Coe

- Sound Effects by Coffee 'Valen' Bat

- Music by TipTopTomCat

- Made with GB Studio from Chris Maltby
